abstract: The study also finds different "reproductive messages" in various genres of music.
snippet: The study also finds different "reproductive messages" in various genres of music.
lead_paragraph: Psychologists sometimes have a way of proving what you always suspected was true. A recent study of popular song lyrics done at the State University of New York in Albany shows not only that messages about sexual relationships dominate the songs at the top of the charts, but also that songs about sex sell better than other songs.

headline.main: This Just In: Study Shows Songs About Sex Are Hot Sellers
